name: Station Obscurum Prealpha Demo
description:
Basic Description: Amidst the vastness of space, cries for help can be easily unheard, and dangers lurk in every corner. You play as an astronaut in search of parts to repair your ship, and stumble upon an abandoned space station. Explore the decrepit station, brave its terrors, unravel its mysteries, and secure the necessary components to save yourself.

Note: This is a pre-alpha demo to demonstrate the features currently fully implemented in the game.

Controls:

Movement: W,A,S,D or arrow keys. (Or Left Stick)

Pick up  Item: Left Click  (Or A Button)

Toggle Flashlight: Right Click (Or B Button)

Camera Movement: Mouse movement (Or Right Stick).
